"Chaotic Border Break":
"The city is under attack by Darkers,
Natives, Mechs and even Dragonkin.
It is likely that they have been manipulated
into attacking us somehow...
In addition, we have also confirmed the
presence of the mysterious machines.
All ARKS are to deploy and retake the city.
――――――――――――――――――――
Clear by collecting [1000] Quest Points.
Failure: Be defeated in the final area."
